title: GroundHoggz | Miami, FL
text:
GroundHoggz | Miami, FL
Groundhoggz are not just another hip-hop rap group that's trying to make there mark in the music industry. They all ready have produced writing and creative concepts for Diamond (9,000,000) and platinum (1,000,000) recording artist. Including Major labels and production companies. Groundhoggz created their own brand of music that combines real life substance with creativity that always captures the audience.
